item.title: 人工智能如何打破职业阶梯
item.description:
白领学徒制的基本逻辑— 以苦力工作换取在职学习— 突然间岌岌可危。【原文：

The basic logic of white-collar apprenticeship — grunt work for on-the-job learning — is suddenly at risk.

】

item.title: 芬克推动贝莱德高风险押注私募市场
item.description: 拉里-芬克（Larry Fink）通过大宗交易让贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.现在，他也在做同样的事情，以确保他的公司不会在私人资产大潮中落伍。【原文：Larry Fink turned to big deals to get BlackRock Inc. out in front of a decade of money gushing into index funds. Now he’s doing the same to make sure his firm isn’t left behind in the stampede into private assets.】

item.title: 介绍喙资本主义，奇趣团队谈鸡
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 来自利马亚太经合组织首席执行官峰会的最新消息
韩国加密货币狂热和 "泡菜溢价 "的全貌
item.description: 在世界上大多数国家，加密货币交易仍然是一种小众追求，仅限于那些风险承受能力最高的投资者。在韩国，加密货币交易风靡一时，而且已经持续了多年。事实上，现在韩国加密货币交易所的比特币和其他虚拟货币交易活动比国家基准股指 Kospi 上的公司交易活动还要多。【原文：In most of the world, crypto trading remains a niche pursuit, limited to those investors with the highest tolerance for risk. In South Korea, it’s all the rage, and has been for years. In fact, there’s now more trading activity in Bitcoin and other virtual currencies on Korean crypto exchanges than there is in the companies on the national benchmark Kospi share index.】

item.title: 中国 "欧洲制造 "电动汽车利用本地供应商规避关税
item.description: 奇瑞汽车股份有限公司的西班牙合作伙伴表示，该公司正在努力为其与中国汽车制造商的合资企业确保本地制造的零部件，以便其汽车能够以欧洲品牌销售。【原文：Chery Automobile Co.’s Spanish partner said it is working to secure locally made components for its joint venture with the Chinese automaker, so their vehicles can be marketed as European.】

item.title: 超级微型公司在纳斯达克上市的最后期限临近，引发分销担忧
item.description: 超级微型计算机公司（Super Micro Computer Inc.现在离最后期限只有几天了，但该计划仍未实现。【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. investors have spent two months waiting for the company to file a plan that would allow it to remain listed on the Nasdaq exchange. With the deadline now just days away, that plan is yet to materialize.】

item.title: 委员会表示，挪威可以等待中央银行数字货币的出现
item.description: 一个为挪威政界人士提供建议的专家委员会表示，即使在现金使用量减少的情况下，他们也不会急于采用由中央银行发行的数字货币，这与邻国瑞典的同行们如出一辙。【原文：An expert committee advising Norwegian politicians signaled there’s no rush to adopt a digital currency issued by the central bank, echoing their colleagues in neighboring Sweden even as cash use dwindles.】

item.title: 科技与力量在人工智能的热潮中碰撞出银河系
item.description:
这两个行业的运行速度大相径庭，因此开始面临压力。【原文：

The two industries operate at wildly different speeds and are starting to face strains as a result.

】

item.title: 马云支持的蚂蚁金服利润增长 193%，实现倒闭后的复苏
item.description: 蚂蚁金服集团公司 6 月份的利润增长了近 193%，扭转了长达一年的下滑趋势，因为这家金融科技公司从政府打压中重新站稳了脚跟。【原文：Ant Group Co.’s profit nearly grew 193% in the June quarter, reversing a year-long decline as the fintech company regained its footing from a government crackdown.】

item.title: 中国的另一增长引擎及时点火
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，驻悉尼的国际经济企业编辑。今天我们关注中国经济的企稳迹象。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics enterprise editor in Sydney. Today we’re looking at signs of stabilization in China’s economy. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: DoorDash 想让您在吃晚饭时搭车看电视节目
item.description: 随着越来越多的美国消费者开始使用共享汽车和外卖应用程序，这些流行服务背后的公司认为，如果它们能相互合作，就能赢得你的忠诚度，并获得更大的发展。但首先...【原文：With rideshare and delivery apps becoming commonplace for more US consumers, the companies behind these popular services think they can win your loyalty and grow even bigger if they work with one another. But first...】

item.title: 全球 80 万亿美元的饮食问题因缺乏健康选择而变得更加严重
item.description: 不良饮食是全球面临的一个根深蒂固的健康挑战，每年造成约 8 万亿美元的隐性成本。【原文：Poor diets are an entrenched health challenge facing the world, driving some $8 trillion in hidden costs each year.】

item.title: 从安第斯山脉到亚马逊河，中国在秘鲁港口的 13 亿美元赌注面临重重困难
item.description: 中国豪赌 13 亿美元，希望秘鲁的一个新港口能够促进南美农业的发展。兑现投资可能比预期的要难。【原文：China has made a $1.3 billion bet that a new port in Peru will boost access to South America’s agricultural bounty. Cashing in on the investment may be harder than expected.】

item.title: Citadel 证券公司通胀主管称美联储无需担心关税问题
item.description: Citadel Securities 的 Durham Abric 表示，美联储的加息路径可能不会因即将上任的特朗普政府的保护主义姿态而中断。【原文：Citadel Securities’ Durham Abric says the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate path probably will be uninterrupted by the incoming Trump administration’s protectionist posture.】

item.title: 穆迪称印度处于 "甜蜜点"，预测 2024 年增长 7.2
item.description: 穆迪评级公司预测，随着家庭消费的缓慢回升和通货膨胀的缓和，2024 年印度经济将增长 7.2%。【原文：Moody’s Ratings forecast a 7.2% growth for the Indian economy in 2024, as household consumption slowly rebounds and inflation moderates.】

item.title: 中国政府试图重振消费者信心，阿里巴巴销售额却令人失望
item.description: 由于中国消费者在经济低迷时勒紧裤腰带，阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司的季度营收不及预期，这对中国政府振兴经济的运动来说是个坏兆头。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.’s quarterly revenue missed estimates after Chinese consumers tightened their belts in a downturn, boding ill for Beijing’s campaign to revitalize the economy.】

item.title: 加密货币泡沫 "VS巴菲特的旧经济：市场日报
item.description: 特朗普胜选引发的投机热潮正在迅速降温：S&P 500 指数已回吐了大选后三分之一的涨幅，本周下跌，而纳斯达克 100 指数则连续四天下跌。新奇的加密货币世界则是另一番景象。虽然比特币从周三的历史高点回落，但自总统投票以来仍上涨了近 30%。【原文：The speculative fervor triggered by Trump’s victory is cooling quickly: The S&P 500 has given up a third of its post-election gain and is down for the week, while the Nasdaq 100 Index is on a four-day losing streak. It’s a different story in the newfangled world of crypto. While Bitcoin has pulled back from Wednesday’s all-time high, it’s still up almost 30% since the presidential vote.】

item.title: 西班牙考克斯公司首次公开募股 1.85 亿美元后股价下跌
item.description: 西班牙水和能源公司 Cox ABG Group SA 在首次公开募股中募集了 1.75 亿欧元（1.85 亿美元）资金，该公司股票在周五首次上市交易中走低。【原文：Shares in Spanish water and energy firm Cox ABG Group SA traded lower in their Friday debut, after the company raised €175 million ($185 million) in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 法国 Proparco 公司为在美国上市的 IHS 公司担保 12 亿美元债券
item.description: 法国国家开发银行 Proparco 是 IHS 控股有限公司发行 12 亿美元双期债券的主要投资者，这是非洲电信运营商有史以来发行的最大债券之一。【原文：France’s state development bank Proparco is an anchor investor for IHS Holdings Ltd.’s $1.2 billion dual-tranche bond issue, one of the biggest ever for an African telecoms operator.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦寻求将亏损的国旗航空公司 PIA 出售给其他国家
item.description: 在尝试失败后，巴基斯坦决定将其无利可图的国旗航空公司直接出售给其他国家。【原文：Pakistan has decided to offer its unprofitable flag carrier to other countries in a direct sale deal as one option after a failed attempt.】

item.title: 公众埋伏向阿尔伯塔省价值 1200 亿美元的养老金发出警报：政府负责
item.description: 这本该是一次增进感情的经历。【原文：It was supposed to be a bonding experience.】

item.title: 欧洲严阵以待，风电激增抑制价格上涨
item.description: 尽管未来一周欧洲西北部将出现低温和降雪天气，但风力发电量的飙升将使电价保持稳定。【原文：Soaring wind power generation will keep electricity prices in check, even as freezing temperatures and snow grip northwest Europe over the coming week.】

item.title: 美国银行策略师称特朗普就职前买入中国和欧洲市场
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）的策略师表示，进入明年，投资者应开始将更多资金投入美国以外的股票市场，因为货币和财政政策将变得更具支持性，以应对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税计划。【原文：Investors should start putting more money into stocks outside the US heading into next year, as monetary and fiscal policy is set to become more supportive to counter Donald Trump’s tariff plans, according to Bank of America Corp. strategists.】

item.title: 特朗普选中疫苗怀疑论者肯尼迪，医疗保健股下滑
item.description: 当选总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他将任命小罗伯特-肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr.【原文：Pharmaceutical stocks declined as President-elect Donald Trump said he’s tapping Robert F. Kennedy Jr. to run the Department of Health and Human Services, potentially elevating a prominent vaccine skeptic and broader industry critic to a top role on health policy.】

item.title: 关注数据和美联储发言人，国债缩减一周跌幅
item.description: 由于交易商将注意力从唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得美国大选转向最新的经济数据和美联储发言人，国债走高，收窄了本周跌幅。【原文：Treasuries edged higher, paring their weekly decline as traders turned their focus from Donald Trump’s US election victory to the latest economic data prints and Federal Reserve speakers.】

item.title: 尼日利亚通胀出人意料，再次加息成为可能
item.description: 尼日利亚的通胀速度超出预期，这使得再次加息成为可能。【原文：Nigerian inflation quickened more than expected, putting another interest-rate hike in play.】

item.title: 特朗普的反监管主张正是人工智能产业想听到的
item.description:
人们普遍认为，当选总统将扭转制定规则的企图，即在开发技术时将安全置于最高速度之上。【原文：

There’s a broad expectation the president-elect will reverse attempts to craft rules that put safety ahead of maximum speed in developing the technology.

】

item.title: KKR 将富士软的出价提高至 1 日元，高于贝恩的竞争对手出价
item.description: KKR & Co.提高了对富士软件公司（Fuji Soft Inc.【原文：KKR & Co. raised its offer price for Fuji Soft Inc. above a rival bid by Bain Capital, winning the backing of the Japanese software developer’s board.】

item.title: Grubhub 火拍后，Just Eat 迎来 2022 年以来最好的一周
item.description: Just Eat Takeaway.com NV 出售其濒临破产的美国业务，引发了该股两年多来最强劲的单周涨势。【原文：Just Eat Takeaway.com NV’s disposal of its ailing US business has sparked the stock’s strongest weekly rally in over two years.】
